channel.title: Welcome, I'm Gary
channel.description: Recent content on Welcome, I'm Gary

item.title: EHR Symptom Detection
item.description: In this project, I used deep learning to identify symptoms in electronic health records.

item.title: Disaster Tweets Detector
item.description: This project aims to detect tweets that signals disastrous events.

item.title: Movie Sentiment Prediction Deployment on AWS SageMaker
item.description: Introduction The General Process The Data The model Deploy the model in SageMaker: Deploy the model using Lambda function and API Gateway Simple Interface Artifact

item.title: Quuppa Tracking Device and Group Dynamics in Education
item.description: I applied three clustering algorithms, namely k-means clustering, Gaussian Mixture Model (GMM) with expectation maximization, and mean-shift algorithm to analyze the Quuppa tracking location data in order to understand group membership and dynamics in an educational setting.

item.title: Crunchbase Founder Analysis
item.description: In this project, I used random forest and XGBoost to classify whether a startup is successful.

item.title: Instacart Market Baskey Analysis
item.description: In this project, I predict next purchases from Instacart’s customer purchases data using XGBoost.

item.title: About
item.description: I am a data analyst/scientist and NLP practitioner in New York City.
